summary: A standalone esp weapon add-on based on dab0ne\'s model.
descriptionHtml:
I made this standalone mod based on dab0ne\'s model, with his permission:
 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3959

It adds the infamous Dragon Slayer sword of Guts from J-manga Berserk, into Skyrim.

These are the stats of dragonslayer:

base damage 38
value 5000
weight 62

To get it, you need to be able to craft the daedric armory;  it requires 100 steel ingots and 4 leather strips to craft, and can be improved using 4 steel ingots.

Apparently it is very heavy (almost 3 times heavier than an ebony greatsword), so it swings rather slow and one power swing consumes huge amount of stamina, you wont be able to wield it for long if you are not a veteran warrior. However it makes up the lack of speed in raw damage.

And here is a video of the sword in action, by Aeariss:
http://www.youtube.com/embed/YmNKOzldZiM
author: Abakus and dab0ne
